definition: Prince Charming/knight in shining armor
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Wang
to rule/to reign over
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I hope my future prince charming has such a personality.
sentences.chinese: 我希望自己未來的白馬王子也具備這樣的個性。

sentences.english: Only a gentleman like Tom Hiddleston could be my Prince Charming.
sentences.chinese: 只有像抖森這樣的紳士才能做我的白馬王子。

sentences.english: My friends asked me why I haven’t found my Mr. Right.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友老是問我爲什麼沒有找到我的白馬王子。

sentences.english: The young man could be called the Apollo of our filmdom.
sentences.chinese: 這個青年大可以稱爲我們電影界中的白馬王子。

sentences.english: Also is the white horse prince and Poor girl the story which some people said.
sentences.chinese: 也就是有人說的白馬王子和灰姑娘的故事。

sentences.english: Or we are just a goodfriend for ever?
My friends asked me why I haven't found my Mr.Right.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友老是問我爲什麼沒有找到我的白馬王子。

sentences.english: She will then say goodbye to the Prince Charming in her dream and continue to grow up.
sentences.chinese: 於是她會道別夢中的白馬王子，重新踏上人生旅程。

sentences.english: And how many do you think prince charming over there on the floor has left?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲躺在地上的那個白馬王子身上還剩多少？

sentences.english: The little girl glimpsed at the charming prince and turned away with face flushing.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩瞧了一眼那白馬王子，就轉過頭，臉都紅了。

sentences.english: But, where is my Prince Charming?
sentences.chinese: 但是，我的白馬王子在哪裏啊？

sentences.english: And I don't need some prince charming, all that is just shallow.
sentences.chinese: 我也不需要什麼所謂的白馬王子，那些都是膚淺的。

sentences.english: Take a headhunting approach to finding your soul mate.
sentences.chinese: 採取獵頭的策略來尋找白馬王子吧。

sentences.english: Every girl fantasizes about finding her prince charming .
sentences.chinese: 每個女孩都夢想找到她的白馬王子。

sentences.english: B: I really hope to find my Prince Charming soon.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望能早點找到我的白馬王子。

definition: the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
time travel
cheerful/happy
the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party
mythological story/myth
time travel
transfer student
sun-drenched
to have one's wish fulfilled
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
loath to part (idiom); emotionally close and unwilling to separate
(literary) to smile
to miss/to yearn day and night
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
